title: Russell Howard: A Joke about Blaming Animals
description: Russell Howard jokes about blaming animals in his Netflix special, "Lubricant". Don't forget to grab your tickets to Netflix is a Joke Festival running from April 29-May 8th 2022.  Tickets go on sale Friday, December 10th at NetflixisaJokeFest.com.
author: podcasts@netflix.com (Russell Howard)
